headline: The Same Circle Again. But Tighter and With More Understanding Each Time.
description: A return through the Glade where pain and prayer become teachers in repetition. Aleksandr re-enters the mythic clearing, not to seek revelation anew, but to feel how the same words now sound different in a changed heart. The piece records the quiet fire of recurrence â€” the sanctity of walking the same path with new understanding.
